rows.label: qst711702_msg0001
rows.name:
Are you making good progress with
the test Gororo gave you, mo?

rows.label: qst711702_msg0002
rows.name:
Mo? You want a hint? Can't be helped,
mo... Here's a big service, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0003
rows.name:
Are you using the Switch Arts that
activate when you switch between
attacker and supporter, mo?

rows.label: qst711702_msg0004
rows.name:
Surprisingly, you can
sometimes topple an enemy
with these Switch Arts, mo!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0005
rows.name:
Among you all, that silver-haired
Blade big bro looks like he
could do it, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0007
rows.name:
Topple an enemy 5 times with a
Driver Combo... If you can do
that, I'll recognize you, mo!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0101
rows.name:
Mo mo?! It seems you've cleared
the test Gororo gave you, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0102
rows.name:
Wondering how I know without looking,
mo? Gororo is a combat pro, mo. One look
at your faces and it's obvious, mo!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0103
rows.name:
Still, my eyes didn't deceive me, mo.
You all are quite something, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0104
rows.name:
This is the end of this test, but I'll
continue testing you, mo! The next one
will be harder, so be prepared, mo!

rows.label: qst711702_msg0105
rows.name:
Also, in Gula, Gororo's
Blade should be scouting
for skilled people, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0106
rows.name:
If you haven't met him yet, I'd like
you to show him your skills, mo.

rows.label: qst711702_msg0107
rows.name:
Well then, I'm looking
forward to seeing you again
for the next test, mo!
